item.title: State test scores, Common Core, STEM JOBS Organic Systems/ Ecological Models
item.description:
Kenneth,

Regarding LAUSD partners, SEEDS program, We Can Foundation.  Liberty Ranch and LA River.  One eco system.  Building a planning tool toward appreciation. 

Please review the 2 attached images regarding common test score competency and ethnic divide. Beach Reporter Oct. 4th 2018 Publication.

Building a STEM PIPELINE as we have discussed must address this Statistical Model.

No where better then Jordan Down, Watts Rising project to build the prototype!!!

This has been mission SLATEZ .  It will manifest Manchester and Vermont.  The Transportation Academy/Foster Boarding School.

Lab deployment in Jordan Down A CASE STUDY.

Marcela interviewed Dominique Morisseau , friend of EncounterLA partner Silky D, last night; theatre on Main and 2nd st. McArthur Genius Award Playwrite following showing of her play/film Pipeline. 

 https://twitter.com/rendler/status/1048393744280502275?s=19

Part of EncounterLA larger Social/ENVIRONMENTAL Justice Narative.
Interview and presentation coordinated by Pando .
